title: Analytica
extract: DEFINITION of Cambridge Analytica. Cambridge Analytica is a London, UK–based political, data analytics, advertising, and consulting firm, which is accused of illegally sourcing Facebook data and using it to influence a variety of political campaigns.Mar 29, 2018
extract_html: DEFINITION of Cambridge Analytica. Cambridge Analytica is a London, UK–based political, data analytics, advertising, and consulting firm, which is accused of illegally sourcing Facebook data and using it to influence a variety of political campaigns.Mar 29, 2018
